snippet: Venezuela will create a scientific panel to investigate the illness of Hugo Chávez, after an accusation by the interim president that the former president’s cancer was caused by his enemies.
abstract: Venezuela will create scientific panel to investigate illness of Hugo Chavez after accusation by interim president Nicolas Maduro that former president’s cancer was mysteriously caused by his enemies.
lead_paragraph: Venezuela will create a scientific panel to investigate the illness of Hugo Chávez, after an accusation by the interim president that the former president’s cancer was caused by his enemies.

headline.main: Venezuela: Panel Will Investigate Roots of Cancer That Killed Chávez
headline.print_headline: Venezuela: Panel Will Investigate Roots of Cancer That Killed Chávez
